name: Sweep Line
statement: Be careful not to make a mistake. You might have to start all over again. — Someone, probably
inputFormat: The first line contains one integer $$$n$$$ ($$$1 \leq n \leq 10^5$$$) — the length of the array $$$a$$$. The second line contains $$$n$$$ integers $$$a_1, a_2, \ldots, a_n$$$ ($$$0 \leq a_i \leq 2$$$) — the array $$$a$$$.
outputFormat: Output a single integer — the number of solutions, modulo $$$20240401$$$.
